name: titleflix
description: Chrome extension to change Netflix tab titles for better bookmarking.
author: Dogu Yilmaz <hello@doguyilmaz.com>

scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:extension
scripts.build:extension: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.package: bun run build && cd dist && zip -r ../titleflix-v$npm_package_version.zip .
